Celebrity birthdays for Nov. 13

12:04 a.m. EST November 13, 2014

Jimmy Kimmel is 47. (Photo: Getty Images )

CONNECT 1 TWEETLINKEDINCOMMENTEMAILMORE

Actors, etc.: Garry Marshall 80. Joe Mantegna 67. Sheila Frazier 66. Frances Conroy 61. Chris Noth 60. Whoopi Goldberg 59. Rex Linn 58. Neil Flynn 54. Jimmy Kimmel 47. Steve Zahn 47. Gerard Butler 45. Aisha Hinds 39. Monique Coleman 34.

Musicians, etc.: Ray Wylie Hubbard 68. Walter Kibby 50. Nikolai Fraiture 36.
